com.magnet.core.api

Interface ServicesLockable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadOnlyTarget, com.magnet.core.api.ServiceInfoProvider, Services, ServicesLookup, ServicesWriteable

    public interface ServicesLockable
extends ServicesWriteable, ReadOnlyTarget
    An extension of ServicesWriteable that supports locking primitives.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object lock()
      Obtains a lock on the Services registry.
      Object lock(Object lock, com.magnet.core.api.Preferences opts)
      Allows the caller to provide it's own lock key to manage externally.
      void setReady(Object lock, boolean runningReady)
      Sets this service into a running / ready state.
      void unlock(Object lock)
      Relinquishes the lock on a previously locked registry.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.core.api.ServicesWriteable

        create, createAndInitialize, destroy, dump, getRegisteredService, initialize, isReady, register, register, register, register, register, register, registerDynamic

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.core.api.Services

        getInjector, lookup, lookup, lookup, lookup, lookup, lookupFirst, lookupFirst, lookupFirst, wasExpectedToBeFound

        lookup

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.common.api.ReadOnlyTarget

        isReadOnly, setReadOnly

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        Object lock()
        Obtains a lock on the Services registry. The owner of the lock essentially owns the services registry.

        Returns:
        the opaque lock
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if another has the lock.

      • lock

        Object lock(Object lock,
          com.magnet.core.api.Preferences opts)
        Allows the caller to provide it's own lock key to manage externally. Also provides a means to establish control settings / options.
        Parameters:
        lock - the opaque lock, externally managed
        opts - the optional services options
        Returns:
        the opaque lock

      • unlock

        void unlock(Object lock)
        Relinquishes the lock on a previously locked registry.
        Parameters:
        lock - the opaque lock
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if another has the lock or if the lock does not match.

      • setReady

        void setReady(Object lock,
            boolean runningReady)
        Sets this service into a running / ready state.
